strategy: Replace the gradient boosting model with a deep neural network (DNN) architecture using fully connected layers with batch normalization and dropout regularization. Engineer features using embeddings for categorical variables like passenger class and deck, and introduce polynomial features of degree 2 for continuous variables (e.g., age and fare) to capture non-linear relationships. Apply target encoding with smoothing for rare categories and use data augmentation via synthetic minority oversampling (SMOTE) to balance the survival classes during training.
